title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.28 - Limitations on conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.28 - Limitations on conditions

State Regulations

Conditions of early closing events that will eliminate
horses nominated or add horses that have not been nominated by reason of the
performance of such horses at an earlier meeting held the same season are
invalid. Early closing events shall not have more than two also eligible
conditions. No condition which has the effect of backing up a horse four or
more classes shall be permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4111.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
